text: Hi all, does anyone have much experience with historic betfair data files, just downloaded a few batches, looking at the "To Score" market and getting some fishy looking prices from the last "ltp", digging a bit further some of these seem to be after match time, which as I understand it the market should be suspended, any idea how/why this can be the case?

text: So after a bit more digging there are a lot of games from the data I've scraped that claim to go in-play, I don't know if this is a change from how it runs now because I can't grab the newer data at the minute, but there are also some games which are both marked as `"turnInPlayEnabled":true` and `"turnInPlayEnabled":false` which I can only assume it Betfair changing their mind from whether they planned for the market to go in-play or not originally
